Html:
where can i find the exact definition of the talent specs used in rawr?

thanks

In the Talents window?

If that's not what you're asking, I guess I don't understand.

Astrylian wrote:
In the Talents window?

If that's not what you're asking, I guess I don't understand.


i use a 40/0/21 build that outputs the same dps of standard rawr Arcane/Frost 40/0/21 in many situations, but not every.
If i equip scryer's blade of focus, the rawr arcane/frost build seems to little outdps mine...
i'd just like to know the distribution of talent points in the rawr build, to check what's different.

thank you
The talent specs in comparison chart are the same as the presets available in the talent window from the dropdown.

Kavan wrote:
The talent specs in comparison chart are the same as the presets available in the talent window from the dropdown.


thank you, it seems i wasn't able to see the "Talents" button -)
